item.source: Adding completionist cape to a 639 rsps

item.title: Adding completionist cape to a 639 rsps
item.dc:creator: @EclipseRSPS EclipseRSPS
item.description:
@EclipseRSPS wrote:

You would need to unpack both the 639 and 666+ cache remove the model id’s and other various parts of the higher revision cache and repack them into the original 639 cache.
Then comes the process of modifying the server and client to be compatible with the “hacked” version of the cache you provided.

The reason I use the term “hacked” is because RS does not use cache revisions like 667/704, that is a 667 cache packed with information from a 704.

Throwing in any 666+ cache won’t work, you need to unpack, add the correct index’s, repack, modify server, modify client, then you still get to take the time to write how the completionist cape actually works and what it does when using the skillcape emote.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding completionist cape to a 639 rsps
